resources.string: Pasticceria Marchesi is spread out across three stores throughout Milan. It’s hard to pick our favorite, each one has the signature pistachio green walls and contemporary decor that give you the perfect Instagram moment.
The sophistication and simplicity synonymous with the Emporio Armani brand can now be experienced in its food and drinks.
Take a step back into time at this historic café that has been serving up coffee in true Milan tradition since 1936.
Fantastic entre of ham and burrata the pasta (tortellini) with clams is fantastic. Great wine list with several Italian and Argentinian options.
One of the best meals we had in Milan. This is an excellent restaurant: tuna tartare, cod fish, tarta tatin onion, seabass , tiramisu, all very good.
Very friendly staff and delicious food! It was a pleasure to eat here although it is little bit off the city center on the other hand it is quiet

This romantic, easily accessible park offers recreational fun(including jogging and bike paths) for adults and kids alike. Flora and fauna abound at Parco Sempione, which stands near some of Milan’s other popular civic institutions and arenas.
